name: Amfus
description:
Jump, jump twice, collect the shards and other collectables.

Features of the game that will not let you get bored:

- Jumps

- Dashes

- Visual novel elements

- Bosses with synchronization with music?! ...Is this a rhythm game or something?

- Original soundtrack written for each chapter and boss

There is also a history mode in which you can... (Sorry, the letters are out...)

Java installed is required (8 or above)
